name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contributed by frontline financial staff of state-owned construction companies

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yiwu issued an initiative: urban and rural residents should store food for more than 10 days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, 2019, the first case of pneumonia of unknown cause was found in Wuhan. This triggered netizens’ memories of the epidemic and their loved ones.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of December 1, in Shantou, Guangdong, citizens reported that multiple vehicles collided and overturned on a road section in Longhu District. 
At around 10 o'clock, the local traffic police department staff said that the traffic on the road section where the accident occurred had been restored and the scene was still being handled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ministry of Finance disclosed the issuance and debt balance of local government bonds in October 2023. As of the end of October 2023, the national local government debt balance was 40101.1 billion yuan, breaking the 40 trillion yuan mark for the first time.
In recent years, in order to hedge against the downward pressure on the economy, the active fiscal policy has been significantly strengthened. One of the manifestations is to increase the scale of local debt and expand government investment, which has also led to a rapid increase in the scale of local bonds.
In 2013, the national local government debt balance exceeded 10 trillion yuan for the first time, exceeded 20 trillion yuan in 2019, exceeded 30 trillion yuan in 2021, and exceeded 40 trillion yuan this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 30, Guangdong. A netizen found that the sticker on the can of cereal he bought said the country of origin was Taiwan, China, but after tearing off the sticker, the country of origin column showed Taiwan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 30, in Neijiang City, Sichuan Province, the Xinhua Harbour City project was left unfinished, and the owners went to the sales office to seek justice for their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 30, Qiqihar City.
Huahe Group has been in arrears of pensions for hundreds of employees for more than a decade. The workers went to the local tax bureau to defend their rights, but were told that they could not handle the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, in Hebei, Xuanang Environmental Sanitation Company had been in arrears of wages for sanitation workers for more than a year, and the workers gathered together and held banners to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, in Changchun, Jilin, a group of elderly people went to the local Human Resources and Social Security Department to defend their rights after they failed to get any results by hanging banners at the Changchun Railway Office due to the company pension issue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 27, Heze City, Shandong Province.
A large number of dismissed private teachers came to the local education bureau for the eighth time to defend their rights, demanding that the government improve and solve the problem of pension security.
"Private teachers" refer to teachers who substitute in private schools in towns and villages. They have worked diligently in their posts for decades, dedicated their precious youth to China's education cause, and made great contributions to rural literacy.
But now, their pension issues are still not guaranteed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 1, Qinhuangdao, Hebei.
Changli Tiancheng Mansion delayed the delivery of houses, and a large number of owners gathered together to hold banners to defend their rights and shouted in unison: We want the houses delivered!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Last week, a subway entrance in Qingdao, Shandong Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of "Blood Trough Sister":
On December 1, the reporter called the Shanghai Health Commission as a family member of a person in urgent need of blood in another place, requesting to coordinate blood donation in another place. The Shanghai Health Commission rejected it on the grounds that "it needs to be applied locally".
The reporter questioned whether "Blood Trough Sister" had such a rescue channel before
The other party said it was unclear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ESLCS @G2m0NESY I feel numb

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, a girl from Xi'an International Studies University jumped into the lake for unknown reasons. Her family members questioned why no one rescued her at the school's north gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/YNl8wmC299

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 30, a teacher at Shijiazhuang Elite Middle School who was well-loved by his classmates died of overwork, which triggered a collective mourning and indignation among the students, as well as criticism of the "Hengshui model": "Education" has long become an industry. This is not a school, but a factory. Students are products, and teachers are workers, just to make profits for the factory owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, government TikTok accounts in many places have started to release videos again, promoting the people's freedom of speech, publication, association, and demonstration as stipulated in the Constitution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The case was solved because December 4th is National Constitution Day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A casual glance at the Shanghai Foreign Language Bookstore

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Douyin blogger posted a video, sharing his experience of encountering a tourist who tried to sneak into Russia during a one-day tour in Manzhouli.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 30, in Tongliao, Inner Mongolia, a man found a camera installed in the dressing room of a bath center. The store responded that it was installed by the government. In response, the police said that there are management regulations and that they will check by gender when necessary.
